sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Flex, Box, Image, Button, Heading } from '@chakra-ui/react'
import money from '../images/money.png'; // using images with import


function HomePage() {
    return(
        <Box  
        background="linear-gradient(135deg, #D86FCC 0%, #01055B 100%)"
        borderRadius="45px 45px 300px 45px"
        color="white"
        display='flex'
        m="auto"
        w="85%"
        h="455px"
        p="70px"
        >
          <Flex direction='column' align="flex-start" justify="space-around">
            <Heading as='h1' size='xl'>
                Track your payments, balances, and dues between groups
            </Heading>
            <Button bg='#CA41D6' size='lg' _hover={{ bg: '#e261ed' }}>Get Started</Button> 
          </Flex>
          
          <Flex align="center">
            <Image width="200px" height="100px" src={money}/>
          </Flex>
        </Box>
    );
} 


export default HomePage;
